sg.edu.nus.cs2020

Class QuestionObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.cs2020.QuestionObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<QuestionObject>

    public class QuestionObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<QuestionObject>
    This class encapsulates an object which contains a name and a list of properties. Note that the class contains an iterator which lets you access the object's properties, as well as a method to determine whether a given property is contained in that object. Throughout we assume that properties are stored in sorted order.

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(QuestionObject you)
        This method compares two QuestionObjects. We say that (x < y) if x.numProperties > y.numProperties. In this way, we sort objects with more properties first.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<QuestionObject>
        Parameters:
        you - the QuestionObject to compare with
